data.title: Rupert Murdoch, 93, marries for the 5th time
data.meta_description: The Fox and News Corp chairman exchanged “I Do’s” with Russian-born retired molecular biologist Elena Zhukova, 67.
data.text:
Media mogul Rupert Murdoch has married once again. For the fifth time.

The 93-year-old Fox and News Corp chairman exchanged “I Do’s” with Russian-born, retired molecular biologist Elena Zhukova, 67, at his California vineyard and estate, Moraga, on June 1, The Sun reported.

During the ceremony, Zhukova sported a form-fitting, mid-length white Emilia Wickstead dress with a square neckline, while Murdoch wore a simple black suit paired with a white button-down shirt, completing the look with a pale yellow tie.

Pictures of the newlyweds were taken at the estate over the weekend and were released by News Corp.

In one of the photos, the two were pictured with their arms wrapped around each other, while in another, the couple sat in chairs outdoors.

The lavish event took place at the secluded property located in the Santa Monica Mountains in Los Angeles’ ritzy Bel Air neighborhood, according to the Moraga website.

This comes after the couple announced their engagement in March 2024. They had started dating the summer before, The New York Times reported.

This was after meeting through Murdoch’s third wife, Wendi Deng, according to The Daily Mail.

Murdoch was most recently married to ex-wife, model and actress Jerry Hall. The pair got married in 2016 and divorced in 2022.

He married his third wife Deng two weeks after he finalized his divorce from his second wife, Anna Maria Torv, in 1999. The former couple share two daughters – Grace, born in 2001, and Chloe, born in 2003. Murdoch and Deng divorced in 2013 after 14 years of marriage.

Murdoch is also father to four other children: daughter Elisabeth, born in 1968; son Lachlan, born 1971; and son James, born in 1972, with ex-wife Torv, whom he married in 1967.

His first child, daughter Prudence, born in 1958, was with his first wife, Patricia Booker. The couple married in 1956 and divorced in 1967, People reported.
